modules.upload_and_convert: Full data upload from thumb drive (src/upload_and_convert.py)

notebooks.01_data_exploration: Explore options, stocks, SPX data with visualizations
notebooks.02_beta_analysis: Beta calculations and beta-weighted delta hedging
notebooks.03_strategy_research: Strategy development template for beta-neutral short premium

next_steps: Implement actual SPY beta hedging in backtest engine
Analyze variance risk premium across different periods
Run full backtest on complete 2002-2013 dataset
completed_milestones: CSV to Parquet data pipeline (35M+ option rows)
Backtest framework with config, strategy, costs, risk, engine modules
Baseline strangle backtest on 10-name pilot (88.9% win rate, 3.69 Sharpe)
Full data upload: 814M option rows, 9.2M stock rows, 9.4M optionstats rows (Feb 2002 - Oct 2013)

notes.2025-12-17-1: Initial CSV to Parquet conversion completed. 145 files, 35.4M option rows.
notes.2025-12-17-2: Added stock quotes (403k rows) and optionstats (408k rows) to Parquet.
notes.2025-12-17-3: Downloaded SPX index data from Yahoo Finance (2000-2014). Created beta calculation module.
notes.2025-12-17-4: Set up Jupyter notebooks for data exploration, beta analysis, and strategy research.
notes.2025-12-17-5: Built complete backtest framework: config, strategy, costs, risk, engine modules.
notes.2025-12-17-6: Fixed MTM bug (missing expiration filter). Baseline backtest: 0.65% return, 88.9% win rate, 3.69 Sharpe.
notes.2025-12-17-7: Added status_report.py for GitHub visibility. ChatGPT can now track progress.
notes.2025-12-18-1: Uploaded full dataset from thumb drive. 141 ZIP files, Feb 2002 - Oct 2013. 814M options, 9.2M stocks, 9.4M optionstats rows. 23x data increase.
